thread.title: Selena Gomez Makes the Case for Winter White to Weather the Storm
thread.title_full: Selena Gomez Makes the Case for Winter White to Weather the Storm

title: Selena Gomez Makes the Case for Winter White to Weather the Storm
text: Selena Gomez Weathers the Storm in Stark Winter White February 9, 2017 9:52 PM by Maria Ward Photo: Getty Images New York City is now under several inches of snow, and many are retreating to the deep-winter section of their wardrobes—think, rubber boots and waterproof jackets. But leave it to Selena Gomez to let the less-than-idyllic climate conditions inspire her look rather than put a damper on it. When the singer stepped out earlier today, she seemed to be channeling the freshly fallen snowflakes with an icy white coat. Gomez’s swingy new outerwear was intentionally oversize, though a clever drawstring tie had a subtle waist-cinching effect. Layered over slim-fitting skinny jeans and a simple knit in the same shade, and the coat gained an added sense of minimalism. A white leather bucket bag worked as a nice complement to her outfit, and boasted a bold red trim that was mirrored by cat-eye sunglasses with rose-colored lenses from Garrett Leight California Optical x Clare V. Gomez is set to return to Los Angeles in time for the Grammys, and if this ensemble is any indication, her red carpet outlook is looking pretty sunny. In This Story: Selena Gomez Recommended For You
